desc: Sophie Williamson Fabrics - 100% Certified Organic Linen Home Textiles - Table Cloths Napkins Pillow Covers - Recycled Paper Greeting Cards - Colorful Floral Prints - Low-Impact Azo Free Reactive Dyes - Conscious Production - Beautiful Homes - Worldwide Shipping

layout.text: Pure organic linen and cotton. Printed with low impact dyes and ethically produced in India. European design to make your house a home. All the colors sans the footprint.
